The view is likely used in scenarios where a comprehensive overview of billing group contracts is required. Potential use cases include:
Generating reports for financial analysis and auditing.
Providing data for dashboards that track contract performance and financial metrics.
Supporting decision-making processes by offering insights into contract availability and fiscal year allocations.

Ensure that only authorized users have access to this view, as it contains sensitive financial data. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to manage permissions effectively.
